Articles.Content:
This. My steam is not updating KSP. Its still version 1.0.2...

Updates are set to automatic

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-24T15:48:10Z" title="06/24/2015 03:48  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 24, 2015</time> by rudi1291**
Back up your game folder first (copy paste everything), then use Steam to 'verify integrity' on KSP. That should force an update.
Sometimes a full STEAM client restart will pick up a new version to download as well.
